dct_description_sm: On lower left margin: "Cartographie des Annuaires Ravet-Anceau." The legend denotes the cemetery, school for girls, school for boys, Church of Saint Pharailde, Church of Thiers [Also known as the Church of Saint Adolph], city hall, and post office.
